# Introduction

This chapter introduces the basics of cross-language computation in Quarto.

```{r}
library(reticulate)
```

## Python Example

```{python}
x = 42
print(f"Python variable x: {x}")
```

## R Example

```{r}
y <- 3.14
cat("R variable y:", y, "\n")
```
